lines.i: Causes of delay at the event scene

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.155"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11288)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10600)/@code="67558-7" Scene delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10599)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10602), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet SceneDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.52 DYNAMIC (CONF:10601)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.10
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11288)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10600)/@code="67558-7" Scene delay NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10599)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10602), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet SceneDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.52 DYNAMIC (CONF:10601)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.10
